thread.title: Ford Recalling 220,000 Kuga SUVs in China
thread.title_full: Ford Recalling 220,000 Kuga SUVs in China - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Ford Recalling 220,000 Kuga SUVs in China
text:
SHANGHAI—Ford Motor Co. is recalling about 220,000 Kuga sport-utility vehicles in China, citing the risk of fuel leakage, the U.S. car maker said Friday.
The cars were built by Changan Ford Automobile, Ford’s car-making joint venture in China, between July 2012 and November 2014, Ford said on its website.
